channel.title: sql on Wilson's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in sql on Wilson's Journal

item.title: on delete cascade
item.description: I have not written SQL in a while, and today I know I needed to define a column with ON DELETE CASCADE. However, playing out the deletion scenario in my head was challenging (i.e. should it be here or the other table?) — it felt like the first time learning SQL. I found a DBA StackExchange thread that was helpful: SQL:2011 Spec of ON DELETE behaviors.
item.content:
I have not written SQL in a while, and today I know I needed to define a column with ON DELETE CASCADE. However, playing out the deletion scenario in my head was challenging (i.e. should it be here or the other table?) — it felt like the first time learning SQL.

I found a DBA StackExchange thread that was helpful: SQL:2011 Spec of ON DELETE behaviors.
